name: Mourneskull

effects.description: Dealing damage calls the spirit of the Lich King from within Mourneskull to drain the souls of nearby enemies, granting you Royal Dominion for 6 seconds, increasing all damage you deal by 7%, up to a maximum of 14% if at least 3 enemies were drained. Cannot occur more often than once every 20 seconds

Dealing damage calls the spirit of the Lich King from within Mourneskull to drain the souls of nearby enemies, granting you Royal Dominion for 6 seconds, increasing all damage you deal by 9%, up to a maximum of 18% if at least 3 enemies were drained. Cannot occur more often than once every 20 seconds

Dealing damage calls the spirit of the Lich King from within Mourneskull to drain the souls of nearby enemies, granting you Royal Dominion for 6 seconds, increasing all damage you deal by 9%, up to a maximum of 18% if at least 3 enemies were drained. While Royal Dominion is active, your attacks will also unleash 2 Vile Spirits at nearby enemies every second that explode on contact, dealing 3% base damage to all enemies near their target. Cannot occur more often than once every 20 seconds

Dealing damage calls the spirit of the Lich King from within Mourneskull to drain the souls of nearby enemies, granting you Royal Dominion for 6 seconds, increasing all damage you deal by 11%, up to a maximum of 22% if at least 3 enemies were drained. While Royal Dominion is active, your attacks will also unleash 2 Vile Spirits at nearby enemies every second that explode on contact, dealing 3% base damage to all enemies near their target. Cannot occur more often than once every 20 seconds
